# Python cache files - these are automatically generated and should not be included
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Virtual environment folders - these contain installed packages and are large
venv/
env/
.venv/
.env/

# IDE project files - PyCharm and VSCode settings should be local only
.idea/
.vscode/

# Windows system files - these are created by Windows, no need to track
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# macOS system files - if using Mac, these files are system-generated
.DS_Store
